subject: Re: EVP Maker
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi Stephen.  I have had good results with the EVPMaker/allophones combo.  Some examples 
are in my files folder here on the boards:

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/SJ%20Allophones/

Margaret

>
> Has anyone tried the program EVP Maker ?

> investigation of an old house.
> 
> Stephen ..
